top_categories.workout_context: 250 miles. Your legs will beg to quit after 120. This trains the power output you need from mile 130 onward.
At King Price Race to Sun, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
20,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
80ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
King Price Race to Sun's South African mountains, Multi-stage forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 250 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic King Price Race to Sun's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 250 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
250 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of King Price Race to Sun. Train it until it feels boring.
20,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 20,000ft of climbing on south African mountain gravel does to your power file on race day.
Low-cadence force work for 20,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 250 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 250 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at King Price Race to Sun. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at King Price Race to Sun requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on south african mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: south african mountains, multi-stage, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, Over Under, and Mixed Climbing to prepare you for 250 miles of south african mountain gravel in South Africa.
